answerText: After the Fall[10] In this other play by the author of After the Fall, a former high school football star steals a pen from Bill Oliver, and the protagonist reminisces about his brother Ben, who struck it rich in Alaska.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | MIT A  | 16 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this play visits a concentration camp with a German archaeologist, and in this play Lou commits suicide after Mickey "names names."  For 10 points each: [10] Name this play that takes place in the mind of Quentin, where he interacts with his former wives.
